description:
With Yuri having passed away, the team must decide what to do next. The photos being posted on social media may offer a clue.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Unforgettable Canned Crab and Canned Mackerel Chirashi Sushi
Wasurerarenai Kani Kan to Saba Kan no Chirashizushi
忘れられないかに缶とサバ缶のちらし寿司
